Jan 27 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:

  • INCREASE IN NAV PER SHARE TO 1,235 PENCE (30 SEPTEMBER 2021:1,153 PENCE)

  • TOTAL RETURN OF 32.6% FOR NINE MONTHS TO 31 DECEMBER 2021

  • RECOGNISED A £201 MILLION LOSS ON FOREIGN EXCHANGE, NET OF HEDGING, IN QUARTER

  • 3I IS WELL SET FOR A STRONG CLOSE TO OUR FINANCIAL YEAR END IN MARCH

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: III.L
